Blood pressure monitor & heart rate tracker app - Our application does not measure blood pressure. The app allows you to track it. For measurement use, FDA-approved blood pressure monitors.

App Main Features:

Blood Pressure Levels:

Normal: Systolic 90-119 and Diastolic 60-79
Hypotension: Systolic 90 and less or Diastolic 60 and less
Elevated: Systolic 120-129 and Diastolic 60-80
Hypertension - Stage 1: Systolic 130-139 or Diastolic 80-90
Hypertension - Stage 2: Systolic 140-180 or Diastolic 90-120
Hypertensive: Systolic 180 and higher or Diastolic 120 and higher

Aging Adults:

In adults, systolic blood pressure rises from early adulthood onward, up to at least age 70. Diastolic pressure tends to begin to rise at the same time but starts to fall earlier in mid-life, approximately age 55. Mean blood pressure rises from early adulthood, plateauing in mid-life, while pulse pressure rises quite markedly after the age of 40.

Consequently, in many older people, systolic blood pressure often exceeds the normal adult range. The rise in pulse pressure with age is attributed to increased stiffness of the arteries.

This application is a quick and easy-to-use tool for assessment of acute pain in cats based on changes in facial expressions. This tool underwent rigorous scientific validation and it was shown to be valid and reliable for the evaluation of pain in cats with different medical and surgical conditions, using both image- or real-time evaluation. 

The Feline Grimace Scale App teaches users about this tool and facilitates real-time pain scoring in cats. It has several drawings and images to facilitate learning, including a practice session. This App can be used by any person. 

Ultimately, the Feline Grimace Scale App aims to improve feline pain management across the globe by increasing awareness, providing education, and facilitating the practical assessment of acute pain in cats.

We tried voice memo apps and other sound-recording apps but felt that there was something more we could do to improve the quality of the sound in a simple setup. Fast forward a couple years and here we are!

Why should you try this app?
- Minimum time to setup. All you need is your iPhone. Simple instructions are provided within the app and we are here to support you all the way.
- High quality sound. Using advanced audio signal processing techniques, we deliver a high quality audio experience that allows you to distinguish your baby's heart sounds. For best results use AirPods.
- Listen for free and only pay when you want to record and share.
- Secure. All recordings are stored on your phone. We do not have any access to your recordings. You decide how you would like to share your recordings.

Free version:
With the free version, listen to your baby's heart sounds unlimited number of times. When you are satisfied, you can purchase a premium version that allows you to record and share unlimited audio recordings of special moments and memories.

One time in-app purchase:
- Features included in Free version.
- Create unlimited audio recordings of special moments and memories. This feature requires a one time in app purchase. 
- Tag locations to remember and visualize where your chances are best for the next time you would like to hear your baby's heart sound.
- When you would like to share the recording, multiple options are provided that include email, text and other social media apps. 
- Store the recording outside the app on your device or external storage apps.

For best results:
- Use the app when you are 20-30 weeks or greater pregnant.
- Use the app in a quiet room
- Remove any phone case/shell/cover (the iPhone needs to touch your skin to be able to pick up the sounds)
- Put the phone in Airplane Mode
- Start the app and place the iPhone on your tummy to listen for a clear sound. You may need to try a few different spots. Press "Record" to create a recording
- Use AirPods

My Baby Heart Sounds Disclaimer:
- The My Baby Heart Sounds app is NOT a Medical Device or application. It is NOT in any way suitable for medical opinion, advice or diagnosis, and it is NOT intended to provide any information about the person of use's wellbeing or health.
- The app does NOT backup recordings automatically outside the user's device. It is the user's responsibility to regularly backup their recordings.

At the end of 2018 we finally wanted to take high blood pressure management more seriously ourselves and started developing a smart blood pressure app: AVAX Blood Pressure Diary.

* CORE FEATURES
Some the reasons that make it the best free blood pressure app:
- Comprehensive charts help you to visualize longer periods of data.
- Statistics that follow current hypertension guidelines and that are easy to understand and give a clear picture of what your arterial pressure looks like.
- Our medication calendar let's you track your intake history and allows you to set up custom medication reminder to avoid forgetting to take your medication.
- The app can also remind you whenever it is time for you to take your blood pressure.
- A monthly status chart shows you if you are actively tracking our bp.
- Easily view your history and export it to CSV or XLSX. There is no limitation to get your data.
- New records can be entered in just a few seconds
- Weight tracker: Track weight (to see if there is a link) or manage weight loss.
- Diabetes tracker: We help you to track blood sugar and manage diabetes.
- Various customization options to make our bp app work you and not the other way round.

* USAGE INFORMATION & DATA PROTECTION
Protecting your personal data is very important to us. The key points here are:
- Login via google account or via email - or use the app completely anonymously (without login)
- We do not track any information that would help someone to identify you. Only your email address is being recorded (unless you do not use a login at all, of course)
- No data is being shared with 3rd parties
- No permissions on your phone or access to personal information is required
- An active internet connection is needed to syncronize across devices

* IMPORTANT INFORMATION
Finally, one last important piece of information: Our app is designed as a companion app for information only. Measuring with your home blood pressure checker, keeping a blood pressure log in a blood pressure tracker app should be part of your therapy, but it can't replace a doctor. We can not be made liable for any issues that occur as a result of using our hypertension app, our medication diary or weight tracker. Please consult your doctor to discuss hypertension management.

We hope you enjoy our app and it helps you to keep your diary and possibly even lower blood pressure levels or achieve weight loss. If you like us, we would be very happy about your feedback and rating.

If you have suggestions for features or encounter any issues, please reach out to us at info@avax.app

ReHand provides patients with an exercise program adapted to their condition and recovery moment. ReHand has been developed by a team of healthcare professionals including surgeons, physiotherapists, physicians and occupational therapists. The exercise programs implemented are evidence-based. All exercises are performed through touches and movements on the tablet screen and guided by feedback, allowing the retraining of the functional ability of the wrist-hand-fingers segment. summary.label:
Height is determined 70% by genetics and 30% by environmental factors like nutrition, health, and exercise. There are many other variables, so the science of height prediction is not 100% accurate. However, there are two methods that can give you a good estimate as listed below. This app implements both the Mid-parent method and the more accurate Khamis-Roche method. Tracking your child's height with this app can show you if your child is developing normally. 

• Mid-parent Method
This method can be used if your child is less than 4 years old. Derived from a 1948 article by Horace Gray in the journal of Child Development, it is still widely used today. The margin of error is +/- 4 inches or 10.16 cm. This is a simple formula where the adult the adult height is calculated from the parents' height and the child's gender.

• Khamis-Roche Method
This method can be used for children 4 to 17 years old. Developed by Dr. Khamis and Dr. Roche, this method is around 90% accurate. It uses the child's age, gender, height, weight, parents' height along with some scaling factors and equations to predict the child's adult height.

• Bone-Age Method
The Bone-Age method is more accurate than the Kkamis-Roche method, but it requires that an X-ray of the hand. Obviously, Adult Height Calculator cannot take X-rays! Maybe a future version of our smart phones can :)

LactApp is the first breastfeeding app capable of solving all your breastfeeding and maternity doubts in a personalized way. You can consult the app from pregnancy, the beginning of lactation, the first year of your baby or any stage of lactation, until weaning at any age.

LactApp is a totally free app for mothers and works as a virtual breastfeeding consultant to which you can ask  all the breastfeeding questions  you may have and the app will be able to offer you personalized answers according to your specific situation, based on your baby’s age, its weight gain for the age (According to the WHO weight charts), your condition (if you are pregnant or lactating, or tandem breastfeeding), etc.

How does LactApp work? It's very simple. input yours and your baby's data, select the topic you are interested  (mother, baby, breastfeeding or pregnancy) and LactApp will be able to ask you tailored questions and offer you 2.300 possible answers depending on your situation.

What breastfeeding topics can I consult? LactApp offers breastfeeding solutions from pregnancy, the immediate postpartum, the first months of the baby and also doubts when they are babies older than 6 months; But not only that, it also considers special cases such as twins or multiple breastfeeding, premature babies, tandem breastfeeding, return to work, mother's health, baby's health, how to combine bottle and breastfeeding, exclusive breastfeeding and many other issues that may affect breastfeeding.

What can I do at LactApp?
In addition to your consultations, you can keep track of your breastfeeding by noting your baby's feeds, his evolution in height and weight, as well as dirty diapers. You can also see the graphs of your baby's weight and height evolution (chart).

LactApp also includes personalised plans for preparing for a return to work and achieving exclusive breastfeeding, as well as easy and useful breastfeeding tests to help you make maternity decisions: ideal for knowing when your baby is ready to eat solids, or is at a good time to breastfeed, or confirming that breastfeeding is working properly.

PROFESSIONAL SANITARY VERSION - LACTAPP PRO
If you are a health professional and use LactApp to help your patients with breastfeeding, this is the ideal version for you. LactApp PRO is prepared so that you can consult on different cases at the same time without having to modify your profile, it contains exclusive resources and articles for professionals.
